entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -41.3°C

Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 11:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
